reference.title: New Android Widget Provider wizard
reference.shortdesc: Creates a new Android widget provider.

strow.stentry: The folder into which the source code for the new widget provider is to be stored. By default this is the current project's src folder.
The package that is to contain the new widget provider. By default this is the current project's package.
The name to be used for the class that implements the widget provider. This should be a simple, non-qualified name.

(optional) The label for the widget provider. Note that if you specify a label, the New Android Widget Provider wizard creates a string resource to hold this value. If the Default option is selected, a label is not set for this widget provider (the Label field is not editable); the application's label is used instead.
This field is not editable. Widget providers subclass android.appwidget.AppWidgetProvider.
Permissions that should be added to the application's manifest file. Click Add to display a list of permissions from which you can choose.
